author: Jeff Neukom
title: Breaking: President Trump Announces Formal Role For Ivanka
text:
Breaking: President Trump Announces Formal Role For Ivanka "I have heard the concerns ..." by Jeff Neukom March 29, 2017 at 3:02pm Share on Facebook Share Tweet Email Email Print   
Following controversy over Ivanka Trump receiving a White House office without a designated role, President Donald Trump has given the first daughter an official role as an unpaid adviser, which comes with the title of assistant to the president. 
“I have heard the concerns some have with my advising the president in my personal capacity while voluntarily complying with all ethics rules, and I will instead serve as an unpaid employee in the White House office, subject to all of the same rules as other federal employees,” Ivanka Trump said in a statement on Wednesday. 
The White House released its own statement , saying the definition of her role should erase ethics concerns.   AHCA Failure Pulls Down Trump Approval Rating 
“Ivanka’s service as an unpaid employee furthers our commitment to ethics, transparency, and compliance and affords her increased opportunities to lead initiatives driving real policy benefits for the American public that would not have been available to her previously,” the White House statement reads. 
Defining Ivanka Trump’s role is something critics of the president have been demanding. 
Earlier Wednesday, Sen. Elizabeth Warren, D-Mass., and Sen. Tom Carper, D-Del., wrote to the Office of Government Ethics, saying Trump’s “increasing, albeit unspecified, White House role … [has] resulted in substantial confusion .”   
“We write today to request information about the ethics rules that President Trump’s daughter, Ivanka Trump, will be required to comply with, or has indicated she will voluntarily comply with, in her role as an adviser to the president,” they wrote. 
Saturday, Rev. Al Sharpton said giving an office to Ivanka Trump, a family member with an unspecified role, is unheard of. 
“Giving an office on the West Wing of Ivanka Trump, somebody explain to me how you can give security clearance, access to classified material, and a office to somebody that don’t have a title or job?” Sharpton said. 
Much of the first daughter’s presence so far has been unprecedented. In essence, the announcement formalizes the role she has already undertaken.
